Renovations

Common Terms & Phrases

Consider educating your followers about these, as needed

Gauge

The term used to describe the diameter of the electrical wire ‚Äì the larger the number, the thinner the wire. Not to be confused with electric meters.

Service Box

Main electrical panel that holds all the fuses and the more modern circuit breakers. The service box distributes electricity evenly through the house.
